### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that the boiler is placed within a reasonable distance from the steam engine to allow for proper connection.
- Check that the pipe connections are not obstructed by other entities or terrain.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace.
- Verify that the furnace is idle and ready to accept items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
